entry.title: [BHS7][Network] - Rack B717B06
entry.content:
Jan 7, 12:24 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/01/2023 10:07 UTC
End Time : 07/01/2023 12:22 UTC
Root cause : Public switch unreachable
Our technical teams replace the equipment to resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 7, 10:32 UTC
Identified - Start time : 07/01/2023 10:07 UTC
Service impact : Public network down
Root cause : Public switch unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
